title: Buick Regal Competes With German Luxury Cars
teaser: GM is trying to breathe new life into its Buick brand. Consumer Reports says the 2015 Buick Regal is competitive with many of its rivals. GM designed the car to compete with Audi, BMW and Mercedes.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
